newsitem.title: USA: MEHL/Biophile in pact to sell laser systems.
newsitem.headline: MEHL/Biophile in pact to sell laser systems.

text.p: MEHL/Biophile International Corp said Monday it has entered into a strategic alliance with Biophile Inc, Thailand for the delivery of 150 hair removal laser systems.
The company said the venture would lead to the creation of hair removal clinics in parts of Asia.
Delivery of the lasers is to begin in the second quarter, the company said. MEHL/Biophile said it expects that about 150 of the systems will be delivered by the end of 1998.
Hair removal systems are to be placed in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia and Hong Kong.
